description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾于2002年至2012年担任中国共产党中央委员会总书记，成为中华人民共和国最高领导人。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party from 2002 to 2012, becoming the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，胡锦涛的前任，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记和中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor to Hu Jintao, who served as General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party and President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，胡锦涛的继任者，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记和中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, successor to Hu Jintao, current General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party and President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在胡锦涛担任国家主席期间任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China during Hu Jintao's presidency.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾在胡锦涛任内担任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Vice President of the People's Republic of China under Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛的妻子。
description.en: Spouse of Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 中国第二代最高领导人，曾支持并提拔胡锦涛。
description.en: The second-generation paramount leader of China, who supported and promoted Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记，是胡锦涛的政治导师之一。
description.en: Chinese politician, former General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party, and one of Hu Jintao's political mentors.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党元老，曾任甘肃省委第一书记，是发现并提拔胡锦涛的伯乐。
description.en: A veteran of the Chinese Communist Party and former First Secretary of the CCP Gansu Committee, who discovered and promoted Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中华民国总统，在任期间持亲独立场，与胡锦涛政府关系紧张。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former President of the Republic of China, who held a pro-independence stance, leading to tense relations with Hu Jintao's government.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中华民国总统和中国国民党主席，其任内两岸关系在胡锦涛政府时期有所缓和。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former President of the Republic of China and Chairman of the Kuomintang, under whom cross-strait relations thawed during Hu Jintao's administration.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中国国民党主席，于2005年与胡锦涛举行了历史性会面。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former Chairman of the Kuomintang, who held a historic meeting with Hu Jintao in 2005.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任北京市市长，因2003年SARS疫情处理不力被胡锦涛免职。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Mayor of Beijing, who was dismissed by Hu Jintao for his handling of the 2003 SARS outbreak.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛的儿子。
description.en: The son of Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛的女儿。
description.en: The daughter of Hu Jintao.

nodes.id: General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
en: General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导人职务。
description.en: The highest leadership position in the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家元首。
description.en: The head of state of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: Chairman of the Central Military Commission (China)

en: Chairman of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国武装力量的最高统帅。
description.en: The supreme commander of the armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家副元首。
description.en: The deputy head of state of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的著名高等学府，胡锦涛的母校。
description.en: A prestigious university in Beijing, China, and Hu Jintao's alma mater.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国江苏省下辖的地级市，胡锦涛的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Jiangsu province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的政治运动，期间胡锦涛的父亲受到批斗。
description.en: A political movement in China from 1966 to 1976, during which Hu Jintao's father was denounced.

description.zh-cn: 在西藏发生的一系列冲突和骚乱，时任西藏党委书记的胡锦涛采取了强硬措施平息。
description.en: A series of clashes and riots in Tibet, which were suppressed with harsh measures by Hu Jintao, who was the Party Secretary of Tibet at the time.

description.zh-cn: 严重急性呼吸系统综合征（SARS）的全球性爆发。胡锦涛政府初期面临的第一次危机，其应对措施包括罢免相关官员。
description.en: A global outbreak of Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS). It was the first crisis faced by Hu Jintao's administration, whose response included the dismissal of relevant officials.

nodes.id: 20th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会
en: 20th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的一次全国代表大会，在闭幕会上，胡锦涛被意外地带离会场。
description.en: A national congress of the Chinese Communist Party, during the closing ceremony of which Hu Jintao was unexpectedly escorted out of the hall.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛提出的社会经济发展理念，旨在减少社会不平等和冲突。
description.en: A socioeconomic concept introduced by Hu Jintao, aiming to reduce social inequality and conflict.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛提出的指导思想，是中国共产党集体智慧的结晶，旨在实现全面、协调、可持续的发展。
description.en: A guiding socio-economic principle of the Chinese Communist Party credited to Hu Jintao, which aims for comprehensive, coordinated, and sustainable development.

zh-cn: 海峡两岸经济合作框架协议

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛任内，海峡两岸签署的贸易协定，标志着两岸关系的缓和。
description.en: A trade agreement signed between mainland China and Taiwan during Hu Jintao's tenure, marking a thaw in cross-strait relations.

description.zh-cn: 一个非正式称号，指代在特定时期中华人民共和国最主要的政治领袖。
description.en: An informal title referring to the most prominent political leader in the People's Republic of China at a given time.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛于1942年12月21日出生于江苏省泰县（现泰州市）。
description.en: Hu Jintao was born in Tai County (now Taizhou), Jiangsu province, on 21 December 1942.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛于1964年毕业于清华大学水利工程系。
description.en: Hu Jintao graduated from the Water Conservancy Engineering Department at Tsinghua University in 1964.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛于1970年与大学同学刘永清结婚。
description.en: In 1970, Hu married Liu Yongqing, whom he had met at Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 胡海峰是胡锦涛的儿子。
description.en: Hu Haifeng is the son of Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 胡海清是胡锦涛的女儿。
description.en: Hu Haiqing is the daughter of Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛于1964年4月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Hu Jintao joined the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) in April 1964.

relationships.target: General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛于2002年至2012年担任中国共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Hu Jintao served as General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party from 2002 to 2012.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛于2003年至2013年担任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Hu Jintao served as President of the People's Republic of China from 2003 to 2013.

relationships.target: Chairman of the Central Military Commission (China)

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛于2004年至2012年担任中共中央军事委员会主席，并于2005年至2013年担任国家中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Hu Jintao served as Chairman of the CCP Central Military Commission from 2004 to 2012, and as Chairman of the State Central Military Commission from 2005 to 2013.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛于1998年至2003年担任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Hu Jintao served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China from 1998 to 2003.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛被认为是2002年至2012年期间中国的最高领导人。
description.en: Hu Jintao was considered the paramount leader of China from 2002 to 2012.

description.zh-cn: 时任甘肃省委第一书记的宋平发现了胡锦涛，并提拔他担任了多个职务。宋平被认为是胡锦涛的政治导师。
description.en: Song Ping, then the first secretary of the CCP Gansu Committee, discovered Hu Jintao and promoted him through several ranks. Song is considered Hu's political mentor.

description.zh-cn: 在1992年中共十四大前，邓小平提议考虑一位五十岁以下的候选人作为未来接班人，为胡锦涛进入最高领导层铺平了道路。
description.en: Before the 14th National Congress of the CCP in 1992, Deng Xiaoping proposed considering a candidate under fifty for future succession, paving the way for Hu Jintao to enter the top leadership.

description.zh-cn: 时任中组部部长的宋平向邓小平等元老推荐胡锦涛作为未来领导人的理想人选。
description.en: Song Ping, then the head of the Organization Department, recommended Hu to Deng Xiaoping and other party elders as an ideal candidate for a future leader.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦支持胡锦涛，并推动他调任贵州省委书记。
description.en: Hu Yaobang supported Hu Jintao and pushed for his transfer to Guizhou as the provincial Party Committee secretary.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛被认为是江泽民的指定接班人。
description.en: Hu Jintao was considered the heir apparent to Jiang Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，胡锦涛的父亲遭到批斗，这一事件对胡锦涛产生了深刻影响。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Hu Jintao's father was denounced, an event that had a deep effect upon Hu.

description.zh-cn: 为应对1989年3月5日在拉萨的骚乱，时任西藏党委书记的胡锦涛请求北京于3月8日宣布戒严以镇压抗议者。
description.en: In response to the riots in Lhasa on 5 March 1989, Hu Jintao, then Party Secretary of Tibet, asked Beijing to declare martial law on 8 March to suppress the protesters.

description.zh-cn: 在2003年SARS疫情爆发后，胡锦涛因其应对不力而罢免了时任北京市长孟学农的职务。
description.en: Following the outbreak of SARS in 2003, Hu Jintao dismissed the then-mayor of Beijing, Meng Xuenong, for his slow response to the crisis.

relationships.source: 20th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 在中共二十大闭幕会上，胡锦涛被工作人员从座位上带离会场，未能参加后续的投票。
description.en: At the closing ceremony of the 20th CCP National Congress, Hu Jintao was escorted out of the hall from his seat and was absent from the subsequent votes.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛执政初期，面临持亲独立场的时任台湾总统陈水扁，双方关系紧张，胡锦涛政府对其采取了不接触政策并通过了《反分裂国家法》。
description.en: Early in his leadership, Hu Jintao faced the pro-independence ROC president Chen Shui-bian. Relations were tense, and Hu's government adopted a no-contact policy and passed the Anti-Secession Law.

description.zh-cn: 2005年4月，胡锦涛与时任中国国民党主席连战举行了历史性会面，这是二战后国共两党领导人的首次会晤。
description.en: In April 2005, Hu Jintao held a historic meeting with then-KMT chairman Lien Chan. This was the first meeting between the leaders of the two parties since the conclusion of World War II.

description.zh-cn: 马英九于2008年当选台湾总统后，胡锦涛采取了更为柔和的外交策略，开启了两岸关系的解冻，并最终签署了《海峡两岸经济合作框架协议》。
description.en: After Ma Ying-jeou won the presidency in Taiwan in 2008, Hu Jintao turned to a more 'soft' diplomatic approach, opening the way to a thaw in relations and eventually signing the Economic Cooperation Framework Agreement (ECFA).

position.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席
position.en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛担任主席期间，曾庆红担任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Zeng Qinghong served as the Vice President of the People's Republic of China while Hu Jintao was President.

position.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席
position.en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛担任主席期间，习近平担任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Xi Jinping served as the Vice President of the People's Republic of China while Hu Jintao was President.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛与温家宝共同领导了“胡温体制”时期的中国政府，胡锦涛担任国家主席，温家宝担任国务院总理。
description.en: Hu Jintao and Wen Jiabao co-led the Chinese government during the 'Hu-Wen Administration', with Hu as President and Wen as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛将科学发展观作为其核心政治理念，旨在解决经济、环境和社会问题，并推动其写入党章和宪法。
description.en: Hu Jintao promoted the Scientific Outlook on Development as his core political philosophy to address economic, environmental, and social problems, and had it written into the Party and State Constitutions.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛和温家宝提出建立和谐社会，旨在减少不平等，改变“GDP第一，福利第二”的政策。
description.en: Hu Jintao and Wen Jiabao proposed to set up a Harmonious Society, which aimed at lessening inequality and changing the style of the 'GDP first and Welfare Second' policies.

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛的任期内，两岸关系缓和，最终促成了2010年《海峡两岸经济合作框架协议》的签署。
description.en: During Hu Jintao's tenure, relations between the two sides of the strait became more cordial, culminating in the signing of the Economic Cooperation Framework Agreement (ECFA) in 2010.
